alert.note: Alert for Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Western Highland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 12 at 4:40PM EDT until March 13 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Total snow accumulations around 1 to 3 inches and a glaze of ice up to one tenth of an inch from freezing rain. * WHERE...Western Highland and the Central Virginia Blue ridge Mountains in Virginia, and western Pendleton County in West Virginia. * WHEN...Until 6 AM EDT Monday. Light snow will mix with light freezing rain and freezing drizzle at times tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Western Highland
